title: Is it permissible to pray in tight trousers or pants
transcript: uh Adrian from Serbia alaykum alaykum Salam is it permissible to pray in uh tight trousers it is not the ideal thing to do to pray in tight clothes but unfortunately the vast majority of trousers are tight no matter how oblique you try to make them and there for the prayer itself is valid and I don't know of Scholars who said that the prayer is invalid but it is valid though it's not recommended to do so and Allah Knows Best
